main.name: Brian Inoa
main.description: Working with TypeScript, JavaScript, Angular 2+, C#, .Net, SQL, and NoSQL. I am always open to learning something new and I am currently looking for opportunities outside of the United States
main.bio: I am a developer who loves to hack around on different projects and technologies. I enjoy a little bit of everything and am sure to try anything once if has to do with food or beer... Outside of the office my hobbies are cooking, rock climbing, and fitness. I have been working as a full stack engineer for 3+ years now and am looking for opportunities outside of the United States.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
